chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
U: fol.System LNN
V: System
AxiomsOK: forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))

Goal:
forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (axm : fol.Formulas LNN), Prf LNN axm f -> (forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) U g) -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarListFormula LNN axm))

Premises:
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
Formulas = fol.Formulas LNT : Set
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (
Prf : forall L : Language, fol.Formulas L -> fol.Formula L -> Set
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
LNN2LNT_formula = fix LNN2LNT_formula (f : fol.Formula LNN) : Formula := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => equal (LNN2LNT_term t1) (LNN2LNT_term t2) | @atomic _ r ts => match r as l return (fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl l)) -> Formula) with | LT => fun t0 : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => translateLT t0 end ts | @fol.impH _ A B => impH (LNN2LNT_formula A) (L
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
freeVarListFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formulas L -> list nat
System = fol.System LNT : Type
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [U : fol.System LNN V : System AxiomsOK : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)) |- Type]
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g
LNN.existSys : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (LNN.existH v f)) g
GEN : forall (L : Language) (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> Prf L Axm A -> Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A)
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula2 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f))
LNN.existE : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.existH v f) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.impH f g) -> LNN.SysPrf T g
folLogic.existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
LNN.orSys : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g h : LNN.Formula), LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) h -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) h -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (LNN.orH f g)) h
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) < -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
LNN.Axm : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> LNN.SysPrf T f

In_freeVarListFormula : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (f : fol.Formula L) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In f F -> In v (freeVarListFormula L F)
freeVarSubAllFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula L f m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))

```coq
intros f axm Pf.
specialize (AxiomsOK f) as [Axm' [Pf' H']].
exists Axm'.
split.
- exists Pf'.
- intros g Hg.
apply H'.
apply In_In.freeVarListFormula_included.
intros v Hfv.
apply freeVarListFormula_included.
apply In_In.freeVarFormula_included.
intros Hfv'.
apply LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1.
apply Hfv'.
Qed.

original: intros f axm Pf. specialize (AxiomsOK f) as [Axm' [Pf' H']]. exists Axm'. split. - exists Pf'. - intros g Hg. apply H'. apply In_In.freeVarListFormula_included. intros v Hfv. apply freeVarListFormula_included. apply In_In.freeVarFormula_included. intros Hfv'. apply LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1. apply Hfv'.
